thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: above average quality/price ratio for Paris
thread.title_full: above average quality/price ratio for Paris - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: NicolasRoth
title: above average quality/price ratio for Paris
text:
Stayed there just one night - with almost random last minute booking. The hotel is very quiet in a small street in the 16. The room was very spacious, super clean, bathroom was large and toilets are separated from the bathroom (at least in my room). The location is a bit off the beaten track as it is in a residential area. I would not recommend this place to someone visiting Paris for leisure, but on a business trip that was very good.
i was craving for a beer but found no mini bar in my room, only complimentary water....
